PhyMediumComments: black-and-white: Ansco Superpan Press safety film
CatDescriptText: Miss Joyce Davis, 7144 Kedron Street, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 11, 1958, pg. 2 with question: "Do you believe youngsters in their early teens, that is from 13 to 16 years of age, should be permitted to smoke cigarettes or drink alcoholic beverages?" answer reads: "No, I don't because they are too young and this will spoil their growth."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Joyce Davis wearing hooded sweater and dark coat, standing in front of object, possibly a refrigerator, on sidewalk with storefront
